mapper.select: SELECT cd_id AS id, cd_goal AS goal, cd_image AS image, cd_name AS name, cd_period AS period, cd_reward AS reward FROM challenge_definition

SELECT cp.user_id AS userId, cp.cp_id AS cpId, cp.cd_id AS cdId, cp.start_date, cp.end_date, cp.`record`, cd.cd_image AS image, cd.cd_period AS period, cd.cd_name AS `name`, cd.cd_reward AS reward FROM challenge_progress cp INNER JOIN challenge_definition cd ON cd.cd_id = cp.cd_id WHERE cp.user_id = #{userId}
